data.text:
@gillianoberholzer 

i have checked on UAT for the images associated with the UAT Company Reg No's provided in the email. i find all the images for the paths returned.

If the issue still persists on Inoxico's side then we might need to get capture their calls as they are doing it to make sure the paths are being returns on their calls. if they do receive the paths then the issue can be the images folder or in the URL being returned.

Please confirm if their issue still persists... taking into consideration my findings mentioned above

card.name: CW - CCW243 - Inoxico UAT Web Service issue
